data.title: RECORD STORE DAY
data.meta_description:
Limited edition picture disc of ELP's classic third album, recorded live at Newcastle City Hall and so instrumental in launching the band to superstardom. Hit the top ten in the UK and the US upon original release in 1971. Part of the ongoing ELP Record Store Day picture disc series. Disc features the original album artwork.
Tracklist Side A 1. Promenade, Pt. 1 2. The Gnome 3. Promenade, Pt. 2 4. The Sage 5. The Old Castle 6. Blues Variation Side B 1. Promenade, Pt. 3 2. The Hut of Baba Yaga, Pt. 1 3. The Curse of Baba Yaga 4. The Hut of Baba Yaga, Pt. 2 5. The Great Gates of Kiev 6. Nutrocker
data.text:
RECORD STORE DAY 2024 > Emerson, Lake & Palmer - Pictures At An Exhibition

Emerson, Lake & Palmer

Pictures At An Exhibition

DETAILS

Event: RECORD STORE DAY 2024

Release Date: 4/20/2024

Format: LP Picture Disc

Label: BMG

Quantity: 1300

Release type: RSD Exclusive Release

Interested in this release?

Try reaching out to your local store to

CHECK AVAILABILITY

MORE INFO

Limited edition picture disc of ELP's classic third album, recorded live at Newcastle City Hall and so instrumental in launching the band to superstardom. Hit the top ten in the UK and the US upon original release in 1971. Part of the ongoing ELP Record Store Day picture disc series. Disc features the original album artwork.

Tracklist

Side A

1. Promenade, Pt. 1

2. The Gnome

3. Promenade, Pt. 2

4. The Sage

5. The Old Castle

6. Blues Variation

Side B

1. Promenade, Pt. 3

2. The Hut of Baba Yaga, Pt. 1

3. The Curse of Baba Yaga

4. The Hut of Baba Yaga, Pt. 2

5. The Great Gates of Kiev

6. Nutrocker
